snippet: Steve Dalachinsky, Charlemagne Palestine and Joe McPhee at the Issue Project Room.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by poet Steve Dalachinsky, saxophonist Joe McPhee and pianist Charlemagne Palestine at Issue Project Room as part of its Ten Years Alive on the Infinite Plain series.
lead_paragraph: Steve Dalachinsky, Charlemagne Palestine and Joe McPhee at the Issue Project Room.

headline.seo: Steve Dalachinsky and Charlemagne Palestine at Issue Project
headline.main: What’s an Avant-Garde Evening Without a Poet and Plush Toys?
headline.print_headline: What’s an Avant-Garde Evening Without a Poet and Plush Toys?
